email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, I was hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, can we confirm the laycan as October 15-20? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the vessel’s specifications and availability. The laycan remains October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per metric ton sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re aligned on the rate. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s finalize the deal. Please proceed with the fixture. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll proceed with the fixture and confirm the details with the owner. The laycan remains October 15-20, and the freight rate is confirmed at $50.00 per metric ton. I’ll send you the finalized agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together. Best, Sarah.
